::SnowCat::

She looked back at the other bot who was behind her in the 
clearing.  "How is the bot wo has fallen? Is it still alive and 
functioning or shall he be dead? I hope he is not dead. Life is to 
precious to be wasted in such a manner."  She turned to the bot int 
he bushes. "Please come out and be known to us.  We shall not cause 
you any harm."
